Description.Name: Pirate Kerby-Fu-Cheatah Console
Description.Details: Unlocked through Event by collecting lootbox compoents from Pirate Spornsored Contracts. So those crazy pirates have built a console to calculate Pirate Points. It gets power from the Pirate Drive Harness and then overrides a jumpships NavCom to allow the console operator to substitute new coordinates closer to the target planet. KF Consoles have 3 main parts: Kerby Injectors, Fu Capacitors and a Cheatah NavComputer. Blueprints are also needed for assembly. Doing specific Ambush, Rescue and Escort missions for Pirates will be rewarded with one of these parts.

AssignedCastDescription: Once the KF Console is coupled with the Pirate Drive Harness Upgrade, we will be able to shave perhaps another 10% off travel time by using Pirate Points. There are risks though...
